lastupdate.content: We all have our imperfections. But I'm human, and you know, it's important to concentrate on other qualities besides outer beauty.
When the ideas are coming, I don't stop until the ideas stop because that train doesn't come along all the time.
The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.
My grandmother started walking five miles a day when she was sixty. She's ninety-seven now, and we don't know where the hell she is.
I only ever run when there's some point to it - say, if it's in a game of tennis.
